articles.title: Punjab National Bank plans to raise capital up to ₹7,500 crore in 2024-25 - BusinessLine
articles.description: PNB plans to raise ₹7,500 crore in 2024-25 via QIP/FPO or other modes. Already raised ₹6,090 crore in 2023-24. Q2 net profit up 327% Y-o-Y.
articles.content:
Punjab National Bank (PNB) plans to raise about 7,500-crore equity capital in 2024-25 in one or more tranches.
The PNB Board took this decision at its meeting on Thursday.
